description: Back by popular demand, fresh out of the camera, we present to you Tommy and Hoyce. These two studs are our most requested on the site, so we had to bring them back.In this scene, Tommy and Hoyce are reunited and boy, are they happy to see each other. After hanging out and cruising around town for a while, the guys decide to come back to the house and watch a little porn. A few minutes into it, Hoyce isn't satisfied with his hand anymore, and bluntly tells Tommy to suck his cock. Of course, Tommy eagerly agrees and starts to service his friend...But it gets better than that. This is definitely a reunion to remember. Enjoy!
title: Hoyce & Tommy D
